column1: It’s been a great two days for trade:  ✔️ #USMCA passes the Senate ✔️ @POTUS signs Phase One of the #ChinaTradeDeal

The Democrats’ obsession with impeachment has halted all normal legislative business. Congress is unable to perform our basic duties of appropriations funding the military and passing the #USMCA. The American people deserve better. It is time to get back to work.
The Democrats’ obsession with impeachment is not just a political distraction it is harming the American people.

There are only 21 legislative days left on the House calendar for this year. Congress has yet to: •Fund the government and our military •Ratify the #USMCA •Secure the border and fix our broken immigration system

It is one thing for the Chinese Communist government to manipulate the lives of our farmers and ranchers for their political gain. It is another thing entirely for the United States Congress to do that to our own citizens.
CCC funding which rural America depends on will now be a political weapon used by both sides moving forward at the expense of America’s farmers and ranchers.
From today’s @HouseAgGOP hearing: It is shameful that Democrats have chosen to use farmers and ranchers as leverage simply because they don’t like this president.
Happy Birthday to the @USAirForce! Thank you to the brave men and women who have defended the ‘wild blue yonder’ to keep us safe for the past 72 years. https://t.co/PHK5cAUtds
It is critical that we put aside politics to work with our colleagues in the Senate and put forth the best possible bill for our troops and for our national security.
As a CPA I will also continue my calls for DoD to become fully auditable to create greater accountability within the department and transparency for US taxpayers.

I’m glad to be a HASC conferee for the FY20 NDAA. During the conference process my colleagues and I will work to address the funding levels for our military as well as serious gaps in readiness and training for our service members.

Democrats are threatening to harm rural America in an attempt to damage @realDonaldTrump by preventing USDA from providing support to ag producers. They are playing political games w/ farmers in a time of unprecedented challenge. https://t.co/7dAPLbsYnJ
#USMCA ensures Canada will eliminate discriminatory grading of U.S. and eliminates country of origin statements on Canada’s quality grade certificates. @TexasWheat #Rally4USMCA #USMCAnow

#USMCA provides for unprecedented market access for U.S. dairy farmers into Canada be eliminating milk classes 6 & 7 – this is a big win for our dairy producers in Texas. @TXDairymen #Rally4USMCA #USMCAnow

American farmers and ranchers across the country have praised #USMCA for its outstanding market access and modern science-based sanitary and phytosanitary standards that are the strongest achieved in any trade agreement which will keep our families safer. #USMCAnow #Rally4USMCA

Canada and Mexico are the two top markets for U.S. grains dairy products meats fresh fruits and vegetables. Nearly one-third of U.S. agricultural exports went to our North American neighbors in 2017. #USMCAnow #Rally4USMCA

American agriculture will reap the benefits of #USMCA which levels the playing field for farmers and ranchers.  Congress can deliver a win for America by passing this 21st-century agreement and it's past time for Democrats to bring up #USMCA for a vote. #USMCAnow #Rally4USMCA https://t.co/SPfrjDzJxI

#USCMA supports American workers and farmers expands access to international markets and strengthens our partnership with Mexico and Canada. It's time for Congress to pass #USMCANow. #Rally4USMCA https://t.co/3hNWXDdH1S
From the @farmbureau: in 2017 the U.S. exported $39 billion of agricultural goods to Mexico and Canada. #USMCAnow #Rally4USMCA
#USMCA is a win for America and an important step in boosting the economy creating jobs and increasing wages. We must pass #USMCAnow #Rally4USMCA https://t.co/ELfs3PkvhX

It is time for Congress to put aside bipartisan differences and ratify the #USMCA.   Let's ensure trade is both free and fair while granting our farmers ranchers and manufactures the protections they deserve. #USMCANow #Rally4USMCA https://t.co/b1jD9xtO8c

With the #USMCA in place our ag exports will grow by an additional $2.2B annually we will maintain duty-free access for American farmers in Mexico & open the Canadian market to American dairy wheat & poultry products. https://t.co/nT80ONN63u
64400 jobs are supported by agricultural exports in Texas with an annual value of $7.2 billion. #Rally4USMCA #USMCAnow

#USMCA is a 21st-century trade deal that will fuel economic growth across America and in Texas create jobs and expand high-quality opportunities for our farmers manufacturers and workers. #USMCAnow #Rally4USMCA https://t.co/sllmsA41ia
